committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To require that the 1990 decennial census of population be corrected for undercounts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce to take measures to ensure that: (1) undercounts which occurred in the 1990 decennial census of population are corrected; and (2) such adjustments are reported to the President and the Congress not later than July 15, 1991.

titles.title: To require that the 1990 decennial census of population be corrected for undercounts, and for other purposes.
